(I would suggest waiting until someone posts about the Maximal City before 
making disgustingly inferior superior non-interior compromises with the 
enemy!  Yeah, that didn't make a bit of sense.  I suggest waiting until 
damage is at least posted at the Maximal City.  That way, ya know, you can 
like make fun of them.  Or something.  Don't listen to me I guess, what the 
hell do I know)

-Uni
